LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Falcon.label: falcon
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Falcon.description: A heavy-duty tri-rotor drone for cooperating in field recon and anti-tank strikes.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Falcon.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Noctula.label: noctula
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Noctula.description: Stealth operaton command-relay Noctula nicknamed "Night bat" is a command-relay variant of tri-rotor drone falcon.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Noctula.tools.head.label: head
